name: Lexus LX
description: The price of Lexus LX, a 5 seater SUV, starts from  of Rs. 2.82 Crore. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 3346 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. LX comes with 10 airbags. Lexus LX has a ground clearance of 205 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 6.9 kmpl for LX.
